annotations.description: GIFT GUIDE: https://www.cocktailchemistrylab.com/gifts Puerto Rico sees your nog of egg, and raises you a "little coconut". This coquito is a delicious, rich...
annotations.title: Cocktails of the World - Coquito (Puerto Rican Eggnog)

textContent:
1 cup coconut water
3 cinnamon sticks
1 tsp nutmeg

Add to saucepan and simmer 20 minutes and let cool. 
Filter into blender and add the following. 

1 can (14 oz) sweetened condinsed milk
1 can (12 oz) evaporated milk
1 can (13.5 oz) coconut cream 

Blend on high for about a minute
Pour into jar and refrigerate up to a week. 
Shake the following.

4 oz coconut base
2 oz light rum

Strain into double rocks glass over ice cubes
Garnish with cinnamon and nutmeg

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n4PeV3UNJKY
title: Coquito
